From now on, you can learn piano in French and Spanish! We have added French and Spanish voiceovers and subtitles to all course videos, the option to learn the note names according to the local "do-re-mi" system, and several traditional French and Spanish

This time we worked behind the scenes and improved the data infrastructure for a convenient learning with flowkey.

With this update, we have set the course for learning in another language; Russian. For now, just the user interface is available in Russian, but the course translations will follow in the next weeks!

Your flowkey team

With this update, all our courses are fully synchronized in Chinese, making piano lessons even easier for all our Chinese speaking users to follow. So spread the word and tell all your Chinese friends about it to learn piano with you.

Your flowkey

For an even smoother learning experience, this update simplifies the UX in our courses (less “Next” buttons).
Also, you can now learn with French, Italian, Spanish, or Japanese subtitles in our first five courses.

Start your lesson now!

We fixed the bugs which could occur when activating the microphone for the Wait Mode. Also, higher notes you play will be recognized more reliably now and the new iPad Pro (3rd generation) is fully supported.

Have fun playing piano! Your flowkey te

This update improves the wait mode feature. A smoother experience is waiting for you.

Have fun playing piano! Your flowkey team

This update adds a number of brand new songs for players at all levels, including a beautiful and FREE version of Queen’s “Bohemian Rhapsody” as a special to celebrate the release of the film.

It also:

- Makes browsing and loading songs / co

With this update there are two new songs available for you to learn for FREE! Have fun learning the seasonal classics "White Christmas" by Irving Berlin and "Dance of the Sugar Plum Fairy" by Pyotr Tchaikovsky.

This update also:
- Solves issues

We have redesigned our song player, making it smoother and more intuitive to switch between learning modes, adjust the tempo, and select different hands to practice. Check it out now!

Happy playing! Your flowkey team

This update fixes a graphic bug that could occur in the song player when learning in German language.
Happy playing! Your flowkey team

You can now feel the new year 2019 spirit also in your flowkey app! A smooth experience and many new songs are waiting for you.

version_description:
This update improves the wait mode feature. A smoother experience is waiting for you.

Have fun playing piano! Your flowkey team

We fixed the bugs which could occur when activating the microphone for the Wait Mode. Also, higher notes you play will be recognized more reliably now and the new iPad Pro (3rd generation) is fully supported.

Have fun playing piano! Your flowkey te

flowkey will get a bit better with every update, even if you don't see it right away. Often it's the little things that make learning a smooth experience. Also this time: we concentrated on improving the song loading. It is much faster now!

Have fu

We have cleaned up and improved our infrastructure to provide a sustainably better learning experience in songs and courses.
Have fun playing piano!
Your flowkey team

With this update, all our courses are fully synchronized in Chinese, making piano lessons even easier for all our Chinese speaking users to follow. So spread the word and tell all your Chinese friends about it to learn piano with you.

Your flowkey

For an even smoother learning experience, this update simplifies the UX in our courses (less “Next” buttons).
Also, you can now learn with French, Italian, Spanish, or Japanese subtitles in our first five courses.

This time we worked behind the scenes and improved the data infrastructure for a convenient learning with flowkey.

flowkey helps you to learn to play piano and we do everything we can to offer you the best learning quality. With this update, we have released many existing songs in further difficulty levels. Have a look for yourself and find your level!

Watch out: This update changes the tempo for loading songs and courses to Presto!

Your flowkey Team

- Performance improved throughout the entire app
- Faster loading times

Have fun playing piano,

With this update, we have set the course for learning in another language; Portuguese. For now, just the user interface is available in Portuguese, but the course translations will follow in the next weeks!

Your flowkey team

Halloween is just around the corner! We've squashed pesky bugs and added new spooky tunes into the cauldron—err, app! Dare to learn them?

Look forward to songs like:

- Hallowe'en Dance – Hans Engelmann
- Will O' The Wisp – Will Morrison

From now on, you can learn piano in French and Spanish! We have added French and Spanish voiceovers and subtitles to all course videos, the option to learn the note names according to the local "do-re-mi" system, and several traditional French and Spanish

We fixed small bugs and added more than 100 new and polished songs. A short excerpt from this list:

- Eine kleine Nachtmusik - Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
- One Summer’s Day - Joe Hisaishi
- The Moldau - Bedrich Smetana
- Gnossienne No. 1 - Er

This time we worked behind the scenes and fixed minor bugs.

This update fixes some minor bugs.
Have you already discovered these beautiful new pieces? Our current favourites are:
- Don Giovanni Overture – Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
- Hungarian Rhapsody No. 2 – Franz Liszt
- Moment Musicaux No. 3 in F mino

Our Christmas update has arrived! Many new Christmas carols from all over the world have been added, including:

- December: Christmas (The Seasons, Op. 37a, No. 12) – Tchaikovsky
- Fröhliche Weihnacht überall – German Traditional
- C’est le j

Our recommendations for learning on piano for the holiday season:

For beginners:
- Jingle Bells – James Lord Pierpont

For experienced players:
- Hallelujah - Messiah, HWV 56 – Georg Friedrich Händel

As a brand new year starts, we are working on multiple improvements to make your experience with flowkey even more enjoyable. In this update, users with traditional Chinese devices will be able to use flowkey in their native language.
Your flowkey tea

Have you learned a new piano piece in 2020, yet? No?! How about learning one of these two:

- Someone to Watch Over Me – George Gershwin
- The Trout – Franz Schubert

Besides adding new songs to our library, we also cleaned up the app a bit

Love is in the air... which is why we’ve cleaned up the flowkey app in time for Valentine’s Day so you can play a song for your loved one without any obstacles.
How about a romantic classic?
- Liebestraum No. 3 – Franz Liszt
- Clair de Lune – Cla

In this update we have released new songs and fixed a few minor bugs. Learn to play one of the newly-released songs! Our current favorites are:

For beginners:
- Love Me Do – The Beatles

For advanced players:
- The Blue Danube – Johann

flowkey helps you to learn to play the piano and we try our best to provide you with the highest learning quality—as we do with this update. You need inspiration for what you want to learn next? How about a classic?
- Prelude No. 1 in C, BWV 846 – Joha

Spring is just around the corner and we have an exciting new update for the season: Japanese and Korean localizations! Now you can complete our piano courses with Japanese and Korean voiceovers and learn local popular songs.

In this update we have further improved the localization for Japanese and Korean users. We have also added a few new popular songs for you to enjoy:
- Asturias, Op 47, No. 5 – Isaac Albeniz
- Castle in the Sky – Joe Hisaishi
Discover more in the

This update brings you a bunch of new songs! This time we focused on a jazzy collection. Do you know any of these? Either way, start learning today and groove along!

- Yes! We Have No Bananas – Irving Cohn, Frank Silver
- Charleston – James Pric

Many of our newest pieces were written by American composers and have been played on pianos all over the world for decades. Here’s a small excerpt from this rich mix of songs:

- Carolina Shout – James Price Johnson
- Hesitation Blues – Jelly Rol
